title: Parallel line fonts
content:
Two fonts that need IDing.  
Sorry they might be distorted as it was screenshot from a page and found on the web.  
Thanks in advance.

1.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054944im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_4772.jpg)

2.

Font: 

 Prism 

Solved By:

author: aa101

comments.content: Do you have a link to the page from which you took the screenshot?

The unidentified sample comes from the [Typodarium 2015](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054944/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/19639679/Typodarium-2015) edition (complete sample [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054944/http:/m1.behance.net/rendition/modules/132572169/hd/c99179206fe7aa92bcf98706329e8e32.jpg)). I was not able to find the list of typefaces used for each day so your best chance may probably be asking directly [Slanted/Typodarium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054944/http:/2016.typodarium.de/).
@ricard0 @ryuk thanks for asking and also link to the project.
